overview: The Pirate, is a punisher who punishes random individuals in the corrupted society according to his own fictive norms but suddenly appears a lump which shakes his main idea and impresses him. The Pirate gets confused in between the lump and his idea.
tagline: korsan, serial killer, mystical, supernatural, telepathy, comte de lautreamont, poetic, poems, sea
title: Pirate
